job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under improving existing systems and integrating different capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Participating in AI model fine-tuning sessions directly aligns with the definition of adapting and improving machine learning models.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools and methodologies is a core part of model development and experimentation.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI capabilities with human expertise to enhance a service, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: The mention of a rapid ramp-up period on multiple products implies a need for quick learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on being 'adept at unblocking yourself' directly points to strong problem-solving and self-sufficiency skills.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on integrating AI capabilities into customer support systems and improving AI models based on human feedback. While there's mention of AI model fine-tuning and prototyping (1.B.1), the primary emphasis is on the application and integration of AI within a broader support system (1.A.1). The role is about enhancing an existing service with AI, rather than developing AI models from scratch or specializing purely in GenAI tasks. The soft skills also lean towards adaptability and self-sufficiency in a technical support context. Therefore, 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' is the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI integration and improvement within a customer support context. The tasks are specific enough to categorize, and the soft skills are also evident. However, it doesn't delve into the specifics of AI model architecture or deep generative AI techniques, making it lean more towards an adjacent role than a core AI engineering one. The confidence is high but not perfect due to the lack of explicit mention of specific AI/ML technologies or frameworks.
